mapper.select: SELECT avgSpeed,riverArea,avgFlow,collectionTime,state,dayFlow,remark FROM flow where collectionTime = (SELECT MAX(collectionTime) FROM flow WHERE DATE_FORMAT(collectionTime,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d'))

SELECT avgSpeed,riverArea,avgFlow,collectionTime,state,weekFlow,remark FROM flow where collectionTime = (SELECT max(collectionTime) FROM flow WHERE YEARWEEK(date_format(collectionTime,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(#{date}))

SELECT avgSpeed,riverArea,avgFlow,collectionTime,state,monthFlow,remark FROM flow where collectionTime = (SELECT max(collectionTime) FROM flow WHERE YEAR(collectionTime) = YEAR(#{date}) AND MONTH(collectionTime) = MONTH(#{date}))
SELECT avgSpeed,riverArea,avgFlow,collectionTime,state,yearFlow,remark FROM flow where collectionTime = (SELECT max(collectionTime) FROM flow WHERE YEAR(collectionTime) = YEAR(#{date}))
SELECT avgSpeed,riverArea,avgFlow,collectionTime,state,totalFlow,remark FROM flow where collectionTime = (SELECT max(collectionTime) FROM flow)

UPDATE flow
stnId=#{stnId},
avgSpeed=#{avgSpeed},
riverArea=#{riverArea},
avgFlow=#{avgFlow},
collectionTime=#{collectionTime},
state=#{state},
dayFlow=#{dayFlow},
weekFlow=#{weekFlow},
monthFlow=#{monthFlow},
yearFlow=#{yearFlow},
totalFlow=#{totalFlow},
remark=#{remark},
WHERE flowId=#{flowId} and collectionTime=#{collectionTime}
mapper.select: SELECT flow.stnId,flow.avgFlow,water.waterLevel,flow.collectionTime FROM flow,water WHERE flow.collectionTime = ( SELECT MAX(collectionTime) FROM flow WHERE stnId = #{stnId} ) and water.c_time = ( SELECT MAX(c_time) FROM water WHERE stnId = #{stnId} )
